entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134002}Not just anyone can enter. You should{F801}be on your way.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134002}Not just anyone can enter. You should{F801}be on your way.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134001}Stop there, young man. Back there's{F801}the sacred ground of the Ring of Gaea.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134002}Not just anyone can enter. You should{F801}be on your way.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134001}Stop there, young man. Back there's{F801}the sacred ground of the Ring of Gaea.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134002}Not just anyone can enter. You should{F801}be on your way.{F801}

entry.source: Say you came to kill Yuriko{F801}Say you want to join the Ring{F801}Walk away{F801}
entry.target: Say you came to kill Yuriko{F801}Say you want to join the Ring{F801}Walk away{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134003}Hahaha! Well, you're honest, I'll give{F801}you that much!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134004}How about I test you to see if you{F801}have what it takes?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134003}Hahaha! Well, you're honest, I'll give{F801}you that much!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134004}How about I test you to see if you{F801}have what it takes?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134005}Hahaha! You're pretty eager, I see.{F801}I like that!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134006}How about I test you to see if you{F801}have what it takes?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134005}Hahaha! You're pretty eager, I see.{F801}I like that!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134006}How about I test you to see if you{F801}have what it takes?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134007}That's right. It's for your own good.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134007}That's right. It's for your own good.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134008}You may just be a young man, but I can{F801}see you've been through hell. Your{F801}swordwork was top-notch.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134008}You may just be a young man, but I can{F801}see you've been through hell. Your{F801}swordwork was top-notch.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134012}You may just be a kid, but I can see{F801}you've been through hell. Your{F801}swordwork was top-notch.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134012}You may just be a kid, but I can see{F801}you've been through hell. Your{F801}swordwork was top-notch.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A man leading some demons stands in{F801}your way.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A man leading some demons stands in{F801}your way.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,134001}Stop there, young man. Back there's{F801}the sacred ground of the Ring of Gaea.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,134001}Stop there, young man. Back there's{F801}the sacred ground of the Ring of Gaea.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134010}But you won't be able to kill Lady{F801}Yuriko like that.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134011}Why don't you build some strength{F801}with us? Go take the entrance test{F801}at Tsukiji Hongwanji.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134010}But you won't be able to kill Lady{F801}Yuriko like that.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,134011}Why don't you build some strength{F801}with us? Go take the entrance test{F801}at Tsukiji Hongwanji.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134014}You should go take the entrance test{F801}at Tsukiji Hongwanji.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man blocking way\0{F87A,-653}{F813,0,134014}You should go take the entrance test{F801}at Tsukiji Hongwanji.{F801}
